Uses of Class
org.zssn.escaperoom.Item

  • Uses of Item in org.zssn.escaperoom

    Subclasses of Item in org.zssn.escaperoom
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    ClueItem
    Item class for all the clues items in the game Each item has a clue necessary for completing the game Clue objects can't be picked up like notes
    class 
    HealingItem
    HealingItem class is a subclass of Item class.
    class 
    HiderItem
    Item class for all the hider items in the game An hider item hides another item in the room
    class 
    HidingItem
    HidingItem class is a subclass of Item class.
    class 
    ItemContainer
    ItemContainer class that contains other items used in the game The items in the container can be removed, but can't be added back
    class 
    Key
    Key class is a subclass of Item.
    class 
    Note
    Notes class that extends Item.
    class 
    Star
    Star class that represents a star in the game that can be used to fill a star hole to complete the final puzzle
    class 
    StarHole
    StarHole class that represents a star hole in the game that can be filled with a star to complete the final puzzle
